appetizers.name: Hummus Platter
appetizers.description: A savory dip served warm with toasted pita.

appetizers.name: Zataar Flatbread
appetizers.description: A delicous flatbread, served with side of labneh yogurt.

cold sandwhichs.name: Feta Wrap
cold sandwhichs.description: A vegetarian wrap, served with either french fries or chips.

cold sandwhichs.name: Cold Cut Combo
cold sandwhichs.description: Twist on a classic sandwich, try it drizzled with greek dressing.

hot sandwhich.name: Shawarma Wrap
hot sandwhich.description: Shredded shawarma chicken, wrapped in pickled beets and tahina sauce in a warm pita-the ideal comfort food!

hot sandwhich.name: Falafel Wrap
hot sandwhich.description: House made deep fried falafel made with your favorite tahina sauce and pickled beets, served in a warm pita-feta cheese optional.

deserts.name: Kanafeh
deserts.description: Classic desert, served warm and drizzled with our simple syrup-a true treat!

drinks.name: Soft Drinks
drinks.description: Served with ice and lemon wedge.
